item.description:
Cyndi & I plan to bike the Minuteman Bikeway starting from Bedford MA and welcome anyone who would like to join us on this leisurely mostly flat paved bike trail. Any type of bike is ok. We'll be on a Tandem that has just had some upgrades done and needs a test ride. We'll stop along route to enjoy the sites. The forecast is for chilly weather so dress warm.

The Minuteman Bikeway passes through the historic area where the American Revolution began in April 1775.

Today, the Minuteman Bikeway is one of the most popular and successful rail-trails in the United States, enjoyed for both healthy recreation and transportation.

The bikeway has become a new type of “Main Street” where neighbors and strangers alike come together while riding, walking, or skating on the path.

In 2008, Rails-to-Trails Conservancy inducted the Minuteman Bikeway into the national Rail-Trail Hall of Fame.

See the link below for information about the Minuteman Bike Path

Minuteman Bikeway Information

Detailed Map of Minuteman Bikeway

We'll meet at the Bedford end of the Bikeway at the intersection of Loomis Street & South Rd. in Bedford MA
item.name: Biking the Minuteman Bike Trail from Bedford Ma.
